text: José Araquistáin Arrieta (born 4 March 1937) is a Spanish retired footballer. He played as a goalkeeper. He made six appearances for the Spain national football team between 1960 until 1962. ==Other websites== * * * * Spain stats at Eu-Football * Biography at Porteros Vascos de Leyenda Category:1937 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish footballers
title: José Araquistáin
